name: @aws-blocks/h2o-gbm-trainer
description: ðŸ§  A project to create a Sagemaker Model Training Docker image for H2O GBM Estimator.

notes.text: Initial version release of the `h2o-gbm-trainer` package.

author: Anil Sener <senera@amazon.com>

scripts.build: chmod +x gbm_scripts/train && docker build -t h2o-gbm-trainer . --build-arg build_mode=${npm_config_build_mode}
scripts.test-local: npm run build --build_mode=local && docker run --rm h2o-gbm-trainer:latest train
scripts.test-local-win: npm run build-win --build_mode=local && docker run --rm h2o-gbm-trainer:latest train
scripts.deploy: npm run build --build_mode=aws && bash push_docker_image.sh h2o-gbm-trainer ${npm_config_region}
